Posts.Content: Hi I have been in letrozole for over 5 years, had problems at first but was referred to the pain clinic at the Marsden in Sutton who sorted me out.  Have been okay until a month ago when i was given Dr Reddys, since then all the side effects have come back with a vengeance, has anyone else had this reaction.  Will see my pharmacist to have them changed.
Posts.Title: battle of the letrozole brands
